scripts.build:i18n: ng run super-firebase-angular:build:en && ng run super-firebase-angular:build:tr
scripts.build:beta:i18n: ng run super-firebase-angular:build:beta-en && ng run super-firebase-angular:build:beta-tr
scripts.server:i18n: ng run super-firebase-angular:server:en && ng run super-firebase-angular:server:tr
scripts.server:beta:i18n: ng run super-firebase-angular:server:beta-en && ng run super-firebase-angular:server:beta-tr
scripts.deploy:prepare:beta: npm run build:beta:i18n && npm run server:beta:i18n && npm run copyToPublic && npm run test:cover && npm run copyCoverageToPublic && npm run compodoc && npm run copyDocumentationToPublic
scripts.deploy:prepare:prod: npm run build:production:i18n && npm run server:production:i18n && npm run copyToPublic && npm run test:cover && npm run copyCoverageToPublic && npm run compodoc && npm run copyDocumentationToPublic
scripts.deploy:beta: npm run deploy:prepare:beta && firebase deploy --project super-murat-beta
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:prepare:prod && firebase deploy --project supermurat-com
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:functions
scripts.lint: ng lint && npm run stylelint&& npm run lint:html && npm run lint:md
scripts.build:functions: npm run lint:functions && npm --prefix "./functions" run build
scripts.serve: del-cli "./functions/dist/*" && npm run build:functions && npm run build && npm run server && npm run copyToPublic && firebase serve --project super-murat-beta
scripts.serve:i18n: del-cli "./functions/dist/*" && npm run build:functions && npm run build:i18n && npm run server:i18n && npm run copyToPublic && firebase serve --project super-murat-beta
scripts.serve:beta:i18n: del-cli "./functions/dist/*" && npm run build:functions && npm run build:beta:i18n && npm run server:beta:i18n && npm run copyToPublic && firebase serve --project super-murat-beta
scripts.serve:production:i18n: del-cli "./functions/dist/*" && npm run build:functions && npm run build:production:i18n && npm run server:production:i18n && npm run copyToPublic && firebase serve --project supermurat-com
scripts.serve:only:firebase:beta: npm run build:functions && firebase serve --project super-murat-beta
scripts.serve:only:firebase:prod: npm run build:functions && firebase serve --project supermurat-com
scripts.install:dependencies:global: npm install -g firebase-tools@6.3.1 @angular/cli@7.3.0 ncp del-cli opn-cli webpack-bundle-analyzer @compodoc/compodoc selenium-webdriver @commitlint/cli
scripts.install:dependencies: npm install && cd functions && npm install

hooks.pre-commit: echo 'Pre-commit: running lint...' && npm run lint && npm run lint:functions
